tool_description: Provides clinical decision support by analyzing patient data and proposed tests to recommend appropriate laboratory testing based on clinical guidelines and best practices.

chief_complaint.description: Primary reason for the patient visit or symptoms

proposed_tests.description: Array of test codes being considered for ordering

medical_history.description: Array of relevant medical conditions or diagnoses

current_medications.description: Array of current medications that might affect test results

allergies.description: Array of known allergies relevant to testing procedures

error_messages: Invalid patient demographics: Age must be 0-150, gender must be [male, female, other].
Missing clinical information: Chief complaint cannot be empty.
Invalid test codes: One or more proposed test codes are not recognized in the system.
Contraindicated testing: Some proposed tests are contraindicated based on patient allergies or medications.
usage: Provide patient demographics, chief_complaint, and proposed_tests. Optionally include medical_history, current_medications, and allergies for more comprehensive recommendations.

recommendation_summary.description: Overall clinical recommendation for the proposed testing

approved_tests.description: Tests recommended for ordering based on clinical guidelines

additional_tests.description: Additional tests suggested based on patient presentation

contraindications.description: Tests that should be avoided due to patient factors
